attributes.action: Ensure that no serving MP, PM or Lord be exempt from the Freedom of Information act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are currently debating their own exemption from the freedom of information act. As public servants it should be their moral obligation to provide transparent governance as they are servants of the taxpayer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
